questions.quote: Well, break 'em. You missed the bris, I want you at the game.
Oh? So, I took your suggestion and I gave my boss Marion's poems. The ones that affected Kramer so much.
Thank you very much. You just stand over there, I?ll stand over here.
Yeah, well, I lost them all in the fire!  Hey, George, maybe you can ask Susan's father for more, huh?
I was locked out of my apartment, I'm just trying to get my keys.
What d'you think is the matter? I've been assigned to work on Kramer's coffee table book.
Yeah, there's something in the air today. You feel it? There's something in the air.
Well, You can't go in there it's like a gas chamber in there.
...Well, I suppose I could,  but I'd have to shift a few things around, uhm... Hold on for a second, will you? Uh...
A relationship is an organism. You created this thing and then you starved it so it turned against you. Same thing happened in "The Blob".
